text.data: Matelite: So, this is the Empire's floating fortress?![end1][end]
[character][0x1]: There's a Holy Dragon here...[0xfc][0x1] A Holy Dragon with tremendous power...![end1][end]
Taicho: The fortress utilizes the power of a Holy Dragon?[0xfc][0x1] That is amazing!![end1][end]
Palpaleos: Sauzer...[0xfc][0x1] Are you here as well...?[end1][end]
Taicho: What are those on the floor?[0xfc][0x1] They appear suspicious!![end1][end]
Matelite: They've got nothing to do with us defeating the enemy!! [0xfc][0x1]Just attack!![end1][end]
Are they not some sort of trap?[end1][end]
There's something in the back room!![0xfc][0x1] A Holy Dragon...?[0xfc][0x1] I have a bad feeling about this... But let's check it out...[end1][end]
